$documentation.purpose: Registry of Jobs-To-Be-Done statements. JTBDs express user goals in the format 'When [situation], I want [capability], so I can [outcome]'. They bridge pain points to actionable requirements.

key_attributes.jtbd[].statement: Full JTBD in 'When...I want...so I can' format
key_attributes.jtbd[].persona: User type this JTBD belongs to
key_attributes.jtbd[].priority: P0 (must have), P1 (should have), P2 (could have)
key_attributes.jtbd[].related_pain_points: Array of PP-* IDs this JTBD addresses

jtbd_types.functional: Core task the user needs to accomplish
jtbd_types.emotional: How the user wants to feel
jtbd_types.social: How the user wants to be perceived
jtbd_types.supporting: Auxiliary tasks that enable the main job

validation_rules: Every JTBD MUST follow 'When...I want...so I can' format
Every JTBD MUST link to at least one pain point
Persona reference MUST exist in user_type_registry.json

description: Registry of Jobs-To-Be-Done (JTBD) with traceability to pain points
